articles.author: Tim Ross
articles.title: The EU is doing exactly what Trump wants. He still doesn’t care. - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: As desperate European leaders beg the U.S. president to let them join peace talks, is he even listening?
articles.content: All 27 EU leaders agreed to do exactly what Trump has been demanding for years: Radically increase their defenses with investment  potentially totaling 800 billion that might just mean they can take … [+1249 chars]
